metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20699 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description: Docker Engine before 18.09 allows attackers to cause a denial of service(dockerd memory consumption) via a large integer in a --cpuset-mems or--cpuset-cpus value, related to daemon/daemon_unix.go,pkg/parsers/parsers.go, and pkg/sysinfo/sysinfo.go.

criterions.comment: docker.io: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
